required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: SHR - 1209 Treatment Efficacy and Safety of the Patients With Hypercholesterolemia Ⅲ Period Clinical Research
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicentric, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Phase III Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of SHR-1209 in Patients With Hypercholesterolemia

brief_summary.textblock: This study is ongoing to evaluate the efficacy and safety of SHR-1209 in patients with hypercholesterolemia.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Background Lipolowering therapy in combination with SHR-1209/ placebo
study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: 12 weeks Percentage change in serum LDL-C levels from baseline.

secondary_outcome.measure: 12 weeks Absolute Changes in serum LDL-C levels from baseline；
12 weeks Percentage change of non-HDL-C relative to baseline；
